abstract: Latest New York Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews with 1,650 adults throughout the United States.
snippet: The latest New York Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews conducted Oct. 19 through Oct. 24 with 1,650 adults throughout the United States.
lead_paragraph: The latest New York Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews conducted Oct. 19 through Oct. 24 with 1,650 adults throughout the United States.
